text: Die Unbesiegbaren is an East German film. It was released in 1953. Werner Peters was one of the actors. ==External links== * Category:1953 films Category:1950s historical films Category:German historical films Category:East German films Category:German-language films Category:Films set in Berlin Category:Films set in 1889 Category:Films set in 1890
title: Die Unbesiegbaren
